programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris decides to set aside her feelings for Basti when Ali admits that he is still not over her and when she recalls the pain of losing him. With Ali's encouragement, however, Iris gathers the courage to break free from her past heartbreak and fight for Basti.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Marcial's investigation reaches a standstill when Pascal is assassinated. But before succumbing to his wounds, Pascal manages to inform the brigadier general that there is a spy in his camp. This compels Marcial to instruct his subordinates to find out who is this traitor in question.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Jessie continues to dig deeper into Pascal's assassination. Despite the development of the investigation clearing Tiago's name from the case, Marcial cannot help but continuously suspect the former. Meanwhile, Tiago recounts to Rhian his life in the military and Marcial's betrayal.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Kulas ends up as the new prime suspect in Romina's rape case. Later, Daniela confronts her father-in-law for hiding the CD to prevent Carlos from reuniting with Romina. The Bartolome patriarch then gives his daughter-in-law an enticing offer. Meanwhile, Robert acquires vital information about the person who stalked him and Romina. Elsewhere, an unexpected event compels Cassie to spend time with Alvin.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: With Hector's help, Alvin manages to avoid an interrogation from Robert and Romina. Robert, however, remains suspicious about the two brothers. He then hires a private investigator to look into them. Eager to get out of jail, Kulas lays the blame on Eric for trying to get rid of the evidence in Romina's rape case. Meanwhile, Myrna makes a decision in hopes of becoming a better mother.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Aryann remains unconscious at the hospital, Waldo decides to cut their ties for good. Tristan finds himself in hot water as he gets blamed for the attempt on Waldo's life.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann is thrown into a vortex of emotions when she learns that she is pregnant with Tristan's child. Unaware of Jenna's plans, Tristan resolves to rebuild his relationship with Aryann.

programme.title: I America
programme.desc: A complex half-Pinay, half-Caucasian lady looking for American living in Olongapo City (Philippines) who tries to get her passport and US visa in order to meet her father personally for the first time.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.

programme.title: Steal
programme.desc: Hiyasmin, Cynthia and Mitchn are Filipinas living in Japan and become friends after a weekend gathering.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris opens her heart to Basti and hears her own heartbeat when they share their first kiss. Meanwhile, Cassandra unexpectedly glimpses someone from her past when she arrives in Greece to witness Iris and Ali's on-the-job training graduation.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Agnes and Cassandra's trip to Greece takes an unexpected turn when they discover Basti's connection with Nestor and Valerie. Still carrying the pain of Nestor's betrayal, Cassandra asks Iris to sever all ties with Basti.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian learns that the military has a mission. She then tries to find out about it, but her attempt turns futile. Meanwhile, the military performs a raid at David's warehouse. There, they discover a piece of evidence that heightens Marcial's hunch about Tiago.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Eager to find the spy in the camp, Marcial draws a conclusion based on his thorough investigation. Later, the brigadier general acquires a vital piece of information about Tiago. Rhian, on the other hand, attends the 26th anniversary mass of Arabella's disappearance in order to spy on Marcial.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Hector comes up with an idea to help Alvin get Robert off his back. Robert, on the other hand, remains convinced that the two brothers are dangerous. In hopes of keeping them away from Cassie, Robert has Alvin fired from Maxwell. However, Alvin refuses to go down without a fight. Meanwhile, Daniela discovers that Romina is inching closer towards solving her rape case.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela learns that Romina is close to finding a suspect in her rape case who happens to be connected to Alvin. She then tips Alvin to find his accomplice, Jonathan, before the authorities arrest him. However, Alvin fails in his quest. As his brother decides to run away, Hector tries to come up with another alibi. Meanwhile, Romina discovers the twisted truth about the man she considered her friend.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: As Waldo struggles to find a new job, he meets a lady who he butts heads with. Aryann and Tristan move in together upon learning of their son's condition, while Jenna seeks revenge.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Waldo's hard work pays off when he receives a job offer. Tristan, Aryann, and Rosing fly to the U.S. where their worst fears about the unborn child is confirmed.

programme.title: Steal
programme.desc: Hiyasmin, Cynthia and Mitchn are Filipinas living in Japan and become friends after a weekend gathering.

programme.desc: Eager to find the spy in the camp, Marcial draws a conclusion based on his thorough investigation. Later, the brigadier general acquires a vital piece of information about Tiago. Rhian, on the other hand, attends the 26th anniversary mass of Arabella's disappearance in order to spy on Marcial.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Long-distance runners Maila and Victoria dream of competing in the SEA Games. As luck favors Maila, Victoria becomes envious when she discovers that Maila has captured Joey's heart. An unexpected incident allows Victoria to seize an opportunity.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Gabriel saves Bianca from drowning, but she loses an important item, causing her to barely make it to the track tryouts. To make it up to her, Gabriel works to replace the item, while Carlos struggles to impress his father, Roman.
